credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Design of a wall mural
medium: Brush and wash, pen and ink on paper.
description: Possibly design of a patron dedication for a wall mural.  At center a black frame where portrait would sit.  At top Jesus and God (?) hold a crown at the top of the frame.  Two winged angels look up at Jesus.  At bottom and winged angel with a helmet looks up at frame while holding a thurbile burning incense.
name: Drawing
